goalsLists.noGoalsDescription: Refresh the page or create a goal

createGoal.title: Set your next goal
createGoal.subtitle: Complete the form and start your journey!

form.descriptionPlaceholder: e.g. 'Learning Python requires time and practice.'
form.stepsTitle: How many steps to achieve it?
form.hoursTitle: How many hours per week can you dedicate?
form.extraInfoTitle: Extra information to help the AI:
form.extraInfoPlaceholder: e.g. 'I know I already know the basics', 'I have a tight budget', 'Only on weekends'
form.goalMinLength: The goal must have at least 4 characters
form.extraInfoMinLength: The extra information must have at least 10 characters

createGoal.errorMessage: An error occurred while creating the goal. Please try again.
createGoal.successMessage: The goal has been created successfully

createSubtask.title: Create subtask

form.subtaskMinLength: The subtask must have at least 4 characters
form.descriptionPlaceholder: e.g. 'Learn the basic concepts of Python programming'
form.errorMessage: An error occurred while creating the subtask. Please try again.
form.successMessage: The subtask has been created successfully
